extendedInfo.description: Pron BrowserPron Browser is a private web browser for viewing adult web sites, dating sites or anything private without anyone finding out!Looking for a discreet private browser? Check out 'Pron' at https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.browser.pronFeatures:â Optimized for adult websites.Supports XNXX, LiveJasmin, Youporn, Cam4, Adult Friendfinder, Video Sex Archive, VICE, FreeOnes, Fling, Ada4Adam, and more!â Blazing fast web engine.With only the features you need to surf your favorite sites, Pron is super fast.  2x faster than other web browsers!â Absolutely no data is saved.When you exit the app, all data and history is removed. Everything that goes on in the browser is remove when you hit Home, Exit or Closeâ Supports agent cloaking (no more mobile-version of sites!)Make websites think that you're visiting from Google Chrome, Internet Explorer, Firefox or Android.â In-App video supportClick on a video-link and a in-app video player with playback the video. Any trace of this is removed when you exit the app.â Minimalistic, maximum space for browsingNo junk, no ads, no extra bars - just maximum space for your browsing experience.â Discreet Icon and Name.App is installed as 'Pron'.â For Adobe Flash-support: ensure that you have the appropriate flash-plugins installed and that your device support Flash. Pron will not provide Flash out of the box, but it does support Flash-content.Supported Devices:Works on Android 1.6 and upwards including all mobile and tablet-devices including Android 3.0 Honeycomb and Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich.Disclaimer:This app is a web browser and does not contain any adult material.  Adult sites can be reached by going to their respective web sites.

reviews.title: Where is it?
reviews.comment: When I click to watch a vid in xnxx. I click \"view low quality\" then something downloads but the video won\'t play. Any help?
reviews.author: Diego Juarez
